[strike] 最初创作ow的那些人看到它一点点成今天这样会是什么心情 [/strike]

2016年的我还是一个初中生，省吃俭用200块购买了这款游戏，跟它和自己的朋友度过了完美的一个夏天，在后面又升级成了328的典藏版。黑影的解密，新活动模式的更新，高审美的皮肤设计。曾经的我因为学业每次活动都是只能打几天，经常省吃俭用来氪补给包，也开出过令人激动的双黄蛋。后面每次更新都会看姐夫的视频解说，因为这很cooooooool！但随着时间流逝，它开始摆烂更新，我也不再上线，姐夫也离开了暴雪，直到守望先锋2的公布和pve的概念片，我仍愿意继续为他消费，因为我还是爱它的。
很可惜，我之前越爱它，我现在就越恨它。一个讲究各个国家的文化特色共存共辉的游戏，它出“zzzq”的角色我也觉得在这世界观合情合理的游戏，它的公司毅然将我们踢开，背刺了开发组，背叛了合作商，更伤害了玩家。
至此，byd煞笔烤迪克，Fa♂Q，泄！

不给你个差评我都对不起当年在1里快乐游戏的朋友，对不起被办公室战争弄走的姐夫和所有老暴雪
我不带任何有没有中文有没有中国大陆服务器的怨念，单纯评价你个所谓的守望二代，那就是，纯纯的笑话
停更四年摆烂，PVE画了大饼然后给玩家撕了，理由是“做了太多但是发现游戏内容不够有趣且冲突”，那你们四年来除了第一个预告片，是一点干货都没拿出来，国内散爆原员工白龙的4G羽中黑历史压缩包在你们面前都是小巫见大巫了
PVP内容删了个T然后平衡发售了一年还没平衡好（说的就是你路霸），猎空伤害5到5.5到6,76步枪伤害1819201918，请问平衡组没事干了要不要咬个打火机
顺带带个话给隔壁暗黑4，让他们也咬个打火机去

Is this a good game?
I think so.
I think the gameplay improvements they made in OW2 are actually quite good.
But let's be honest, the shit they pulled with the: "We are working on PvE content" only to then not deliver, and bury everything new behind massive paywalls, when things used to be free and much better, it just leaves a very bad aftertaste.
Would I be willing to spend money again on lootboxes if I could also get them through normal playing? Would I spend money on this game if I felt valued and respected as a player? Absolutely. I have and would do again.
But with this, yet another Battlepass, and content that is so ridiculously overpriced, fuck no.
Once in the past I said that Overwatch was a posterchild of modern gaming, that the way the did micro transactions was better than most other places.
But no more. 
Sure, it wasn't great really, it was still bad with the lootboxes. but it WAS better than other games in comparison.

It is sad to see this have turned the way it has.
I wish that things will improve again.
but I am doubtful.

What is OW2. A new game for them to collect money without using too many effort. It's the same thing to OW1 just slightly upgraded graphics and from 6v6 become 5v5. No offtanks anymore and tanks is just another DPS but more HP. PVE they said want to add into OW2 has been cancelled, so this game it just OW1 in the end. 
Stupidly unbalance heroes, I believe dev didn't even test their own game when I heard they're going to rework their new hero after released few weeks after. Let players test for you right? 
Removed all the loot boxes so they can force people to buy skins, there's no way for F2P players to grind skins anymore. Just a bunch of greedy mdfks try to make their money collector work. For those who still wanna enjoy OW I'll recommend go "X" or Phub. Why stress yourself here after your whole day of hardwork outside.

It still feels so weird seeing this game on here.

Personally I don't hate Overwatch. I've been a TF2 fanboy since 2010. When OW1 was released I celebrated its innovations in the realm of team based shooters, and what ideas it could give a game like TF2 in the future. Wasn't a fan of its lootboxes, and relatively sweaty community, but from what I saw the game looked fun and its community was strong and loyal to it like TF2s (I will admit tho OW beats TF2 in its porn by a landslide). Unfortunately, its unnecessary sequel, OW2, Is a game I can't give much praise to.

This game:

- Features a battlepass that locks new heroes behind a massive grindfest. If you want them immediately you gotta cough up around $10 for them.

- An item shop with outrageously overpriced items. A lot of which are around $15-$20. As much as I personally love D.Va (my fav pornstar) I aint shoveling out $10-$15 to play as  her in a cop outfit, or a school uniform.

- Different types of in-game currencies. There's your premium currency "Overwatch Coins" that require real money to get (not obtainable via battlepass btw), and your lesser currency "Legacy Credits" obtained either from the battlepass or from leftover credits carried over from the old Overwatch. Premium gets you fancy looking skins while lesser gets you reskins of the base skins for each hero.

- On the topic of Overwatch Coins not being obtainable via the battlepass why can't OW2 grant you premium currency through it??? Other games with battlepasses (Fortnite, Apex, Warzone) grant you around 1500 of whatever their premium currency is as you progress through their BPs. Hell if you save those, their even enough to get you the next BP without having to spend more money for currency for another BP

- Makes you miss lootboxes as a microtransaction mechanic. A sentence I never thought I'd ever say along with "Overwatch is now on Steam."

-A PvE (THE WHOLE REASON WHY OW2 EXISTS IN THE FIRST PLACE) that was cancelled in May, then resurrected as this $15 paywall per story mission campaign?!?!?

- On top of all this, OW2 is a game "developed" by Blizzard. The same company that is currently trying to implement another unnecessary BP in Diablo IV, and had one of the most predatory microtransaction systems with Diablo Immoral last year. 

On the upside, I can now play this game without needing to use the god awful battle.net launcher (thanks Microsoft! Once Warzone Caldera shuts down I can uninstall that shitty software at last!). 

Plus I can run it on my steam deck now without having to do a bunch of tedious steps to get the game to not crash like before (recommend Proton Experimental for this or your controls wont work after you die once)

Do I recommend you play this? Sure. It's fun, but VERY flawed

Do I recommend you spend any money on this? Fuck no. Don't encourage Blizzard to do shit like this in the future. Save your money, and spend it on a better game that deserves your money like Baldurs Gate 3 or Elden Ring

Is OW2 porn better than the game? Yes! Yes! Yes! Yes! Y E S!!!

At least the porn doesn't ask you to empty your wallet left and right.

Overwatch 2 and Blizzard: they fuck you harder than all the generic 3D dudes that porked down Tracer, D.Va, Widowmaker, and Mercy COMBINED!
